name: 2019 The 3rd International Conference on Agricultural and Food Science (3rd ICAFS2019)
content:
Dear Friends and Colleagues, 
 On behalf of the Organizing Committee, it is our great pleasure to welcome you to participate the [**2019 International Conference on Agricultural and Food Science** (ICAFS 2019)](https://icafs.apaset.org/) to be held in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia during December 8-11, 2019\. (>>[General Information](https://icafs.apaset.org/2019/about/)). 
 Website: <https://icafs.apaset.org/> 
_**Organizers**_ 
 The conference is organized by Asia-Pacific Association of Science, Engineering and Technology in cooperation with multiple academic affiliations. 
_**Previous**_ 
 Previous ICAFS were succesfully held in [Istanbul, Turkey (2018)](https://icafs.apaset.org/2018/) and [Lahore, Pakistan (2017)](https://www.icbb.vu.edu.pk). This year the ICAFS2019 is combined with ICCEMB2019. 
_**Topics**_ 
 It has been designed to provide an innovative and comprehensive overview of agricultural and food science. A focus will be given on: 1\. Agronomy, Agriculture and Plant Biotechnology; 2\. Animal Biotechnology, Veterinary and Livestock Science; 3\. Aquiculture, Fishery and Marine Biotechnology; 4\. Forestry Science, Tropical Forest and Wood Research; 5\. Food Science and Nutrition; 6\. Agriculture Sustainable, Resources & Environment; 7\. Related Engineering, Economic & Management, etc. ([\>>More topics](https://icafs.apaset.org/2019/about/#topics)) 
_**Publication**_ 
 All accepted abstracts will be published in conference abstract book after register. Selected full papers will be considered for publishing in [_International Journal of Pharmacology, Phytochemistry and Ethnomedicine_](https://www.scipress.com/IJPPE) (IJPPE, ISSN: 2297-6922). 
_**Program and Event**_ 
 The conference will last for two days, detailed [program please refer here](/2019/program/). After the conference, we will organize an academic visit to local institutions. 
_**Venue**_ 
 Kuala Lumpur officially the Federal Territory of Kuala Lumpur or commonly known as KL, is the national capital and largest city in Malaysia ([\>>More about venue](https://icafs.apaset.org/2019/venue/)). 
 We look forward to an exciting meeting that promises great scientific debate and enjoyable interaction in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. ([\>>Register here](https://icafs.apaset.org/2019/registration/)). Please also bring this notice to the attention of any of your colleagues who may be interested in participating in the conference ([Download Flyer](http://img.apaset.org/uploads/soft/ICAFS2019%5FFlyer.pdf "Please help circulate the conference information."), [Registration Form](http://img.apaset.org/uploads/soft/ICAFS2019%5FRegistration%5FForm.doc)). 
 
 With best regards, 
 
 Dr. Jichun Jing & Guangfu Yan 
 Organizing Committee of ICAFS 2019 
 Email: icafs@apaset.org 
 icafsconf@hotmail.com 
 Website: <https://icafs.apaset.org/>
organizers: Asia-Pacific Association of Science, Engineering and Technology (APASET)
